actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to purchase property located within the San Carlos Mineral Strip.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to purchase property located within the San Carlos Mineral Strip, taking title to such property in the name of the United States in trust for the San Carlos Apache Indian Tribe.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to purchase property located within the San Carlos Mineral Strip.
